summary: Implemented a new Custom Domain setup section with domain + canister ID inputs and added runtime URL-based share/copy behavior to support custom domains. One potential gap is that the visible label/navigation entry says "Custom Domain Setup" rather than exactly "Custom Domain" (as stated in the AC), though an in-page section and a navigation-style button are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: A visible navigation entry or in-page section labeled "Custom Domain" exists in the app.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a section titled "Custom Domain Setup" and a Settings icon/button with aria-label/title "Custom Domain Setup". The acceptance criteria explicitly calls for a label "Custom Domain"; an exact match is not evidenced.
